reviewText: Just a mexican cinema classic, I saw it while living in Mexico years and years ago and now I found it on amazon :)

A 4 story movie,that explain,some problems in society,such as bad habits,corrupcion and religion. The stories are never boring,and have some twisted endings, This movie is a not very new,It was made before the "new mexican wave"
but it made a greate job as a starter.
